thread.title: Yosemite Valley Visitor Map

title: Yosemite Valley Visitor Map
text:
Thanks for sharing About.com with others! Most Emailed Articles 
How to Outsmart Dog Owners Who Don't Scoop Their Poop Death Valley Yosemite Valley Map 
There's a lot packed into the Yosemite Valley and this map is created with visitors in mind, to help you figure out where everything is and how to get to it. I shows the major attractions, places to stay and the starting points for some nice day hikes. 
The map is interactive and you can click on anything you see on it to find out more. If you want to see a legend next to it, if you want more detail - or if you need to get driving directions, try the full-size Yosemite Valley Map . Yosemite Resources
